tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Root canal specialist Dr. Aparajita of Apollo White Dental in Madhapur is one of the best in the twin-city for dental care and painless treatment. I visited the clinic multiple times in the past week for the treatment of my two teeth, one lower right and another lower left, which were causing a lot of inconvenience. Dr Aparajita treated me. She was excellent in diagnosing the problem and never had any ambiguities about the procedures of treatment. She not only explained to me about the problem explicitly, but also told me clearly during the treatment the medicines and other things she is using. I felt extremely comfortable during the multiple lengthy sittings as she treated with alacrity. She kept asking me whether I am getting any pain or feeling any discomfort repeatedly during the treatment. Her post treatment care was amazing, as she frequently enquired about the condition of the teeth. I liked her knowledge, confidence, energy and diligence which set apart a doctor from others in the profession.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I injured my tooth while eating, early this year.Â  I never felt a pain like that on my tooth and was sure something is serious. However, I showed to three highly recommended doctors before coming to Dr. Aparajita. All the other doctors were unable to identify the injury and sometimes looking to cross sell other services that were not relevant. In case of persistent pain, the only default option that they said was root canal without a second thought. When I came to Dr. Aparajita, within few minutes she was able to identify the fracture on my tooth and provided me a detailed understanding of the issue as well as treatment options available. For the first time I was told about the fracture- all other senior doctors within the practice failed to even identify the issue in the first place. Post this first visit, Dr. Aparajita was my go to dentist! My treatment included some minor procedures which were a breeze. Her treatment approach is not intrusive and taking the easy route but trying to assess the different options with the patient with pros and cons in short and long term which gives you comfort in the process and makes you feel part of the decision making. I saved my tooth ultimately with minor surgery rather than loosing it completely and didnt even have to do a RCT which was the only option provided by all other doctors. Highly recommend Dr. Aparajita to all dental patients in Hyderabad.Â

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Aparajitha madam knows what treatment is needed for patient..she is gold madal.. Definitely she is good doctor.. Without pain she has done root canal treatment and with out Anastasia also.. She knows about the injury.. If required only she will give Anastasia... Simply handover your teeth to her.. She will make it good... No need to think about... Just simply visit and remove pain.. I am very happy with doctor.. Selected good doctor.. She is in top in the treatment... Thanks apologize.. Keep supporting good doctors to stay in clinic .. It will be helpful to people

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr. Aparajita because of tooth ache and general pain in the jaws. After looking at the XRay of my bad tooth, she advised me a Root Canal treatment. The treatment options were explained very clearly by the doctor and a preparatory medication was also suggested. On the day of the Root Canal treatment, I was given the clear explanation of the process. Once the process started, the doctor found that the decay has not gone up to the pulp and hence I was not required to undergo the RCT. I was only given filling and advised to check the pain or sensitivity after the anaesthesia wears off. I am very impressed by Dr. Aparajitaâ€™s professionalism and sound knowledge. Any other doctor would have gone ahead with the RCT even though it is not required. She is also very friendly and keeps you informed of the progress during the process. I strongly recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had my procedures done by Dr. Aparajita Gangrade who is highly professional and extremely competent. She took the time to explain to me the various options along with their pros and cons. She is a perfectionist and always enquired about my comfort. She is highly trained and is very familiar with the state of art procedures as per international standards. Her assisting staff Sagar, Rajnikanth are very competent. In the beginning, I was first seen by Dr. Nandha Gopal Vura, a highly trained doctor with a pleasant personality who advised me on the procedures which were done by Dr. Gangrade . In summary, an excellent team of very competent professionals. Highly recommended.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was quite apprehensive vising a dentist for my teeth issues and after reading some reviews, visited Dr. Aparajita.  From the first visit, she made me very comfortable and patiently explained the problem with my teeth and how to get it fixed.  During the procedure, besides from explaining what she is doing, she is very concerned and kept enquiring time to time regarding any discomfort.  She is very friendly and approachable.  Post procedure care is also great and she made me comfortable reaching out to her with any doubts.   I am very much satisfied with the care and treatment I received from Dr. Aparajita.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review:
I had a lot of pain in my teeth. I got a treatment from Dr. Aparajita. She is very friendly. She can speak Hindi and English both. She is Endodontist here, root canal specialist.
She is following precautions to prevent patients and all the staffs from corona. She wears PPE kit for treatment. I am really happy that I got treatment from Dr. Aparajita. She will you her mobile number if you have any problem, you can text her or call her. In corona situation I have visited to one other hospital but without my check up they gave me some pain killer. After taking pain killer also cavity was killing me. I recommed to everyone Dr. Aparajita if you have any teeth problem.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Tooth Filling,

review: The lockdown has been extended till May 31st , however my tooth ache wasn't going away Dr Nandgopal was kind enough to brief me that they have taken all precautions to maintain hygiene .After getting my hands sanitized and being given a set of gloves Dr Aparajita  informed that they would take wear the PPE before operating on me .Kudos to Apollo Dental clinic.and Dr Aparajita for being their and serving us .

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Doctor Aparajita,  She is an absolute professional lady with great enthusiasm and dedication towards her work. I visited her so many times for  my re-root canal done . she every time managed to do it with patience *** *** *** ** *********** **********  and i hope her passion for her work will guide her and will help her to achieve more heights in her career. Thank you being my dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: ***** ******** She explained thoroughly the process of RCT. While doing the treatment she was very concerned and kept on checking if I am fine every now and then. This gives confidence to the patients. She did the RCT almost painfree and after the treatment also there was not much pain. She explained the medicines to be taken, what those medicines are for. This is infact the first time I did not get any other side effects like stomach upset etc on taking an antibiotic. This is because the doctor checked with me on my usual side effects on taking an antibiotic and she prescribed tablets to avoid those side effects as well. I would recommend the doctor to everyone.
